validation.titleMinLength: Title must be at least 5 characters
validation.descriptionMinLength: Description must be at least 20 characters

incidents.reportDescription: Use this form to report any safety incidents, near misses, or observations.

incidents.confirmSubmissionDescription: You are about to submit this incident report. This action cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to proceed?

incidents.noSiteNearby: No site found within 500m of your location
incidents.locationDetailsPlaceholder: e.g., Building A, Floor 2, Near entrance
incidents.locationDetailsDescription: Optional: describe the specific location within the site

quickCapture.title: Quick Capture
quickCapture.description: Upload photos or video - with power of AI to auto-detect hazards

quickCapture.invalidPhotoType: Only JPG, PNG, or HEIC photos allowed
quickCapture.invalidVideoType: Only MP4, MOV, or WebM videos allowed
quickCapture.uploadNote: Photos and videos will be uploaded with your incident report

incidents.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this incident? This action cannot be undone.

closedOnSpot.label: Closed on the Spot
closedOnSpot.description: Enable if you have already mitigated this hazard at the time of reporting
closedOnSpot.confirmMessage:
You are confirming that this observation has been fully mitigated and the risk has been eliminated.

By proceeding, this observation will be marked as Completed.

incidents.riskRatingDescription: Assess the potential risk level of this observation
incidents.observationSimplified: Observations have a simplified workflow - no investigation required

mfaEnroll.title: Enable Two-Factor Authentication

mfaEnroll.toastDescription: Two-factor authentication has been enabled for your account.

mfaDisable.title: Disable Two-Factor Authentication
mfaDisable.description: Enter your current 2FA code to disable two-factor authentication
